Package com.rodolk.numserver.logserver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionsListener.NewConnectionSubscriber  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferQueue
    BufferQueue is used for inter-thread communication.
    ConnectionHandler
    A ConnectionHandler handles one socket connection with an ApplicationProtocol When the tread runs, it calls execute in the Application Protocol and the call only returns when the connection finishes.
    ConnectionsListener
    Connection listener is a thread that listens to the server socket waiting for new connections
    DataProcessor
    DataProcessor implements interface DataConsumer.
    IntFileWriterThread
    This class implements a thread that reads ArrayElement's from the BufferQueue and writes all numbers to a file.
    IntProcessor
    This class reads ArrayElement's from a BufferQueue and determines if the numbers in the array are unique or duplicate by calling the contains method of IntStorageStrategy.
    IntStorageBitArrayStrategy
    This class uses a strategy that is good for the exercise.
    IntStorageStrategy
    This is an abstract class that allows use of different strategies to store and read elements.
    IntStorageTreeIntStrategy
    This class is part of a Strategy pattern.
    Main  
    Observer
    Generic observer for Observer pattern.
    ServerManager
    This class manages the whole server.
    Statistics
    Statistics is a singleton that provides statistics from the system.
    Subject
    Subject for Observer pattern.
